villagers.name: John Smith
villagers.backstory: Born and raised in the village, John has been farming since he was a young boy.

villagers.name: Emma Baker
villagers.backstory: Emma moved to the village five years ago to open her own bakery.

villagers.name: Michael Johnson
villagers.backstory: Michael learned carpentry from his father and has been crafting furniture for the village for over two decades.
